original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nando bhagavato mātucchāputto abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko caturaṅgulomako bhagavatā.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nandaḥ bhagavataḥ mātucchā putto abhirūpaḥ hoti dassanīyaḥ pāsādiko catur aṅgulomakaḥ bhagavatā
saḥ sugata cīvara ppamāṇam cīvaram dhāreti

original: Addasaṁsu kho therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ nandaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
analyzed: kho therāḥ bhikkhū āyasmantam nandam dūratas uva āgacchanta

original: Te upagate jānitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: te upagate jānitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā nando sugatacīvarappamāṇaṁ cīvaraṁ dhāressatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmā nandaḥ sugata cīvara ppamāṇam cīvaram dhāressati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, nanda, sugatacīvarappamāṇaṁ cīvaraṁ dhāresī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva nanda sugata cīvara ppamāṇam cīvaram dhāresi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, nanda, sugatacīvarappamāṇaṁ cīvaraṁ dhāressasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva nanda sugata cīvara ppamāṇam cīvaram dhāressasi
neta nanda appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu sugatacīvarappamāṇaṁ cīvaraṁ kārāpeyya atirekaṁ vā, chedanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu sugata cīvara ppamāṇam cīvaram kārāpeyya atirekam vā chedanakam pācittiya

original: Tatridaṁ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇaṁ—dīghaso nava vidatthiyo, sugatavidatthiyā; tiriyaṁ cha vidatthiyo.
analyzed: tatridam sugatassa sugata cīvara ppamāṇa dīghasaḥ nava vidatthiyaḥ sugata vidatthiyā tiriyam cha
idam sugatassa sugata cīvara ppamāṇam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: dīghaso nava vidatthiyo, sugatavidatthiyā; tiriyaṁ cha vidatthiyo.
analyzed: nava vidatthiyaḥ sugata vidatthiyā tiriyam cha vidatthiyaḥ

original: karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
Attanā vippakataṁ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: attanā vippakatam attanā pariyosāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Attanā vippakataṁ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: attanā vippakatam parehi pariyosāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Parehi vippakataṁ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: parehi vippakatam attanā pariyosāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Parehi vippakataṁ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: parehi vippakatam parehi pariyosāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Aññassatthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: aññassa atthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Aññena kataṁ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: aññena katam paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: vitānaṁ vā bhūmattharaṇaṁ vā sāṇipākāraṁ vā bhisiṁ vā bibbohanaṁ vā karoti,
analyzed: vitānam vā bhūmattharaṇam vā sāṇi pākāram vā bhisim vā bibbohanam vā karoti

original: Uddiṭṭhā kho, āyasmanto, dvenavuti pācittiyā dhammā.
analyzed: uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmantaḥ dvenavuti pācittiyāḥ dhammāḥ
parisuddhā itthā ayasmantaḥ tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti
